price: That is because Allah has sent down the Book in truth. And those who differ over the Book are surely in extreme dissension.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ نَزَّلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۗ وَإِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱخۡتَلَفُواْ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لَفِي شِقَاقِۭ بَعِيدٖ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-anna al-laha nazzala al-kitāba bil-ḥaqi wa-inna alladhīna ikh'talafū fī al-kitābi lafī shiqāqin baʿīdin
